text.div:
This code system http://aehrc.github.io/genclipr-fhir-ig/CodeSystem/FindingType defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
patient-reported Patient ReportedAn observation done by the patient, for example a symptom.
laboratory-finding Laboratory FindingHigher-level observations derived from laboratory observations. For example, a positive laboratory test for the presence of nitrite in urine can be represented as an observation of Nitrituria.

name: FindingType
title: Finding Type
description: Extends the Observation Category codes to include additional categories.

concept.definition: An observation done by the patient, for example a symptom.
Higher-level observations derived from laboratory observations. For example, a positive laboratory test for the presence of nitrite in urine can be represented as an observation of Nitrituria.
